channel.title: Work on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Work on Notes

item.title: Docsumo
item.description:
Junior Backend Engineer - Docsumo

June 2024 - Present

  • Maintaining and improving APIs for document extraction
  • Research and Experimentation for better table extraction from documents

Python Intern - Docsumo

November 2023 - June 2024

  • Developed fraud detection algorithms for bank statement analysis.
  • Built analytics features for banking clients.
  • Collaborated with the R&D team to enhance security features.

item.title: Solar Labs
item.description:
Backend Developer Intern - The Solar Labs

July 2022 - April 2023

  • Developed REST APIs using Python and Django/DRF.
  • Worked on backend services and database optimization.
  • Utilized Azure Pipelines for continuous integration and deployment.

item.title: GeeksForGeeks
item.description:
Technical Content Writer - GeeksForGeeks

June 2021 - September 2021

  • Authored 60+ technical articles on topics like shell scripting, Linux, and web development.
  • Contributed to tutorials and educational resources for the programming community.
